name: code-to-content
description: CodeToContent - Transform your code into compelling content

scripts.dev: concurrently --names "BACKEND,WORKER,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "blue,yellow,green" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:worker" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
